item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, April 4, 2025 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:

3. New antibiotic that kills drug-resistant bacteria found in technician's garden (46 points | 9 comments)
4. Build an 8-bit computer from scratch (204 points | 25 comments)

7. Overengineered Anchor Links (294 points | 122 comments)
8. Supervisors often prefer rule breakers, up to a point (108 points | 64 comments)

22. AI 2027 (446 points | 287 comments)

26. Aviator (YC S21) is hiring engineers to build AI DevEx platform ( | hide)
27. AnimeJs v4 Is Here (678 points | 91 comments)
28. Binary Distribution Rebuilds (21 points | 1 comment)
29. Reasoning models don't always say what they think (349 points | 242 comments)
30. InitWare, a portable systemd fork running on BSDs and Linux (152 points | 85 comments)
